mapper.select: select* from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (select*from gym order by g_id)a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select* from gym where m_number = #{m_number} and common_mcd = 20 and g_isdeleted = 0
select* from gym where m_number = #{m_number} and common_mcd = 20 and g_isdeleted = 0
SELECT g_name, g_address, g_tel FROM gym WHERE g_name LIKE '%' || #{totKeyword} || '%' OR g_address LIKE '%' || #{totKeyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GYM (G_ID, M_NUMBER, G_NAME, G_ADDRESS, G_TEL, G_COMPANYNUMBER, G_DOCUMENT,G_REGDATE,COMMON_BCD,COMMON_MCD,G_ISDELETED) VALUES (G_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{m_number},#{g_name}, #{g_address},#{g_tel}, #{g_companynumber},#{g_document},SYSDATE,500,10,0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.* FROM GYM g ORDER BY g.G_REGDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.* FROM GYM g INNER JOIN ( SELECT G_ID, MIN(S_PRICE) AS MinPrice FROM G_S GROUP BY G_ID ) gs ON g.G_ID = gs.G_ID INNER JOIN G_S gsd ON g.G_ID = gsd.G_ID AND gs.MinPrice = gsd.S_PRICE ORDER BY gsd.S_PRICE ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT d.G_ID, g.G_NAME, g.G_ADDRESS, COUNT(DISTINCT o.M_NUMBER) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM GYM_ORDER o INNER JOIN G_S_DETAIL d ON o.S_NUMBER = d.S_NUMBER INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON o.M_NUMBER = m.M_NUMBER INNER JOIN GYM g ON d.G_ID = g.G_ID GROUP BY d.G_ID, g.G_NAME, g.G_ADDRESS ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT o.M_NUMBER) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.G_ID, g.G_NAME, g.G_ADDRESS, AVG(gr.REVIEW_STAR) AS AVG_STAR FROM GYM_REVIEW gr INNER JOIN GYM g ON gr.G_ID = g.G_ID GROUP BY g.G_ID, g.G_NAME, g.G_ADDRESS ORDER BY AVG_STAR DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
